title: GQL: A New ISO Standard for Querying Graph Databases
author: Joab Jackson
description: The International Standard for Organization (ISO) has a published an international standard for querying graphs, called the Graph Query Language (ISO/IEC 39075:2024).
cntitle: GQL：查询图数据库的新 ISO 标准
cndescription: 国际标准化组织 (ISO) 已发布一项用于查询图表的国际标准，称为图查询语言 (ISO/IEC 39075:2024)。
